name: Rojo Ninja
description:
Rojo Ninja is a story about a young and adventures red ninja on an adventure to regain his honor and to take back a prized possession that was stolen from him. 

the game includes multiple enemy types, challenging levels, cut scenes with voice acting (i did all the characters myself). difficult boss battles and more

i created this game using the blender game engine as well as gimp 2.8

i hope you enjoy the game and please feedback is always welcome 

and i plan to keep it updated so if you find any bugs that may have slipped past me let me know :D.
